bug.author: guihao-liang
bug.summary: unity_sframe::append should accept SFrame with different name order
bug.description: it should behave the same as python layer. Talked <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hoytak>@hoytak</denchmark-link> , we should move logics from python to engine so people relying on c-api will expect the same behavior.

comments.comment: sframe x with columns {a:int, b:str, c:int} should accept appending sframe y with same columns but appearing different order, such as {b:str, c:int, a:int}. The logic to reorder columns of sframe y is inside python instead of cpp unity_sframe.
Work is completed. Closing this issue with such a fortunate and lucky issue number.
